title: 07/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Suns win, sending them to the NBA Finals. Should this be consider a successful season for the Clippers? Soon to be Hall of Famer Chris Webber joins us to discuss Chris Paul's reputation around the league and shares stories. And Darren Rovell tells us who the big winner of NCAA NIL will be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
